name: Crashblocks
description:
A simple, relaxing puzzle block game.

  • Place colored blocks next to each other.
  • Don't let the blocks stack all the way to the top!
  • Placing round crashblocks will clear blocks of the same color.
  • Creating combos of blocks getting cleared will greatly increase your score!
  • Earning a higher score will let your blob progress further along its journey.
  • If you're online while playing, you may meet blobs on their own journeys!
